paragraphs.body: There are still unresolved issues concerning images. For one, we haven't reached any consensus about image sizes and their use on user pages. ― Thailog 19:24, 5 July 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: There are still unresolved issues concerning images. For one, we haven't reached any consensus about image sizes and their use on user pages. ― Thailog 19:24, 5 July 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I understand not uploading images solely for userpages, but limiting the number of images per userpage? That doesn't make sense. If an image is already in existence on the wiki, why not allow it to remain in use on userpages? --I'm The Bos - Talk - Guardian 20:47, September 29, 2010 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I understand not uploading images solely for userpages, but limiting the number of images per userpage? That doesn't make sense. If an image is already in existence on the wiki, why not allow it to remain in use on userpages? --I'm The Bos - Talk - Guardian 20:47, September 29, 2010 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Why are all of the images so small? Aren't larger images preferable? Cevan (wall • contribs) 14:19, April 13, 2015 (UTC)
